title: Just My Suck
description: One minute I’m a proud and protective father-to-be, the next there’s another dude taking over.Enter the angel Kafziel, sent back to earth to ensure the safe arrival of my wife’s vampire twin babies.Aria seems a little too enthusiastic as the attractive angel moves into the suite next door. Yet she’s becoming increasingly frustrated with me.So here I am, feeling fed up and useless. To distract myself, I offer to help Stan and Fenella with their new year wedding preparations, seeing as Christmas is a busy time for Santa and his wife-to-be.But will Aria and I be celebrating a happy new year with two beautiful babies, or will she decide her and Kaf are a match made in Heaven?It’d be Just My Suck.The best Paranormal Chick Lit books on the virtual shelves!Who are we? We’re a group of cray-cray authors who thought it’d be totes fab to all write and release #paranormalchicklit books together. From witches to fae to super sexy shifters, we’ve got the best #PCL in any flavor you desire.For more information, visit our website www.paranormalchicklit.com
author: Andie M. Long
